title: Integrate swipe phase and checkpoints into fo-experience
description:
Wire up the swipe phase and checkpoints into the main fo-experience component.

File to modify:
- app/fo-03/components/fo-experience.tsx

Integration:
1. After Step 7, trigger initial batch generation (batch 1)
2. Show loading state during generation
3. Display swipe phase for 10 cards
4. Show Step 8 checkpoint after 10 swipes
5. If Continue: generate batch 2, swipe, show Step 9 checkpoint
6. If Continue again: generate batch 3, swipe, show Step 9 checkpoint
7. After max 3 batches or user chooses to stop, show transition and proceed to Step 10

State updates:
- Track currentBatchNumber (1-3)
- Accumulate approvedAffirmations and skippedAffirmations across batches
- Pass all onboarding data to generateAffirmationBatchFO03

Reference app/fo-02/components/fo-experience.tsx for batch generation flow.
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds; manually navigating to localhost:3000/fo-03 shows the onboarding flow through to swipe phase
closed_reason: Integrated swipe phase and checkpoints into fo-experience.tsx. Added imports for SwipePhase, StepCheckpoint, and server action. Added hasSwipedOnce state tracking. Implemented generateBatch function calling generateAffirmationBatchFO03 with all onboarding context. Added swipe helper functions. Steps 8-9 now show: loading during generation, SwipePhase for swiping cards with persistent messaging, StepCheckpoint variants (batch1/subsequent/transition) after each batch. Users can swipe up to 3 batches or choose to stop early.
